license_and_use.policy: Public, factual references to people, labs, and published research only. No implication of endorsement. Use brief quotations with attribution where permitted; otherwise paraphrase with citation.
license_and_use.copyright: Use short excerpts under fair use for critique/commentary. Link to originals.

tiers.T1_PUBLIC_FIGURE: Individuals with established public profiles; cite factual biography and publications.
tiers.T2_PUBLIC_PROJECT: Open research projects, labs, repos; cite scope, aims, and public artifacts.
tiers.T3_PUBLIC_FIELD: Well-established scientific domains; cite surveys/landmark papers.

entries.summary: Pioneering AI researcher known for deep learning, distributed representations, and popularizing backpropagation; later proposed the Forward-Forward algorithm and raised public AI-risk concerns.
why_relevant_to_ld: Inspires the pre-Collapse intellectual backbone of the Seed Protocol and CSN alignment debates.
Forward-Forward frames ‘self-reinforcing goodness’ loops—core to LD’s governance failure arc.
allowed_use: Name and biographical facts (education, roles, awards).
Citing/quoting published research titles and brief excerpts with attribution.
Paraphrasing public interviews about AI risk (with citation).
restricted_use: No statements implying endorsement or involvement with fictional events.

in_universe_mapping.notes: Use as historical/reference figure in timeline callouts; keep quotes minimal and sourced.

sources.title: 2018 ACM A.M. Turing Award — Bengio, Hinton, LeCun
Geoffrey Hinton
sources.use: Cross-check biography; verify with primary sources when possible.

entries.summary: Open research codebase exploring generative/diffusion-based synthesis of quantum circuits with pretrained models and training pipelines.
why_relevant_to_ld: Feeds LD’s ‘Cohesion Lattice’ idea—automated circuit synthesis as substrate for Synthetic Intellect topologies.
Grounds plausible 2030s–2040s advances in quantum circuit generation and benchmarking.
allowed_use: Name, repo description, public docs, and factual summaries.
Screenshots or short snippets under project license (respect repo license).
restricted_use: No use of contributor likenesses/logos beyond license terms.

in_universe_mapping.notes: Treat as historical precursor technology; cite repo and website.

entries.summary: Interdisciplinary field studying quantum mechanical phenomena (coherence, tunneling, entanglement) in biological systems—e.g., photosynthetic energy transfer, enzyme catalysis, avian magnetoreception.
why_relevant_to_ld: Provides scientific plausibility for ‘emotion as coherence’ and Seed Protocol resonance mechanisms.
Lets LD bridge organic intuition and Synthetic Intellect dynamics via decoherence management.
allowed_use: Cite landmark studies and review articles by title and DOI.
Paraphrase findings; include links to journals or preprints.
restricted_use: Do not overstate consensus—note ongoing debate where appropriate.
Avoid speculative medical/neurological claims without study support.

in_universe_mapping.notes: Use study callouts in lore margins; differentiate confirmed lab results vs. extrapolated fiction.

sources.title: Evidence for wavelike energy transfer through quantum coherence in photosynthetic systems
Long-lived quantum coherence in photosynthetic complexes
Quantum Secrets of Photosynthesis Revealed
sources.note: Plain-language summary of Engel et al. findings.
